name: Potter
description:
Help FlowFlow find his best friend Pottie again because without him he simply cannot live.

Don't expect anything great as this is my first ever game. I know there are lots of issues like slow loading times of the map etc. but hey, I kind of finished a project.

Yes, I intentionally didn't add music *cough*.

To play the game, download the folder, unzip it and start "GetaGameJam7.exe".

Created for the Geta Game Jam 7.
